house_listing.house_description: 3 bedroom with added family room. Home in wonderful condition. Great neighborhood, near jobs, bus, schools. You must see this home & area. Call for appt to see, inside as nice as exterior. 2 car garage.Seller in process of completing the remodel, the following will be complete prior to close of escrow, hall painted, front window stucco completed etc
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Ceiling Fan(s), East Facing, Main floor bedroom
